channel.title: Request lock, fixed my own issue

item.title: Request lock, fixed my own issue
item.dc:creator: @rofllewisrofl rofllewisrofl
item.description:
@rofllewisrofl wrote:

For example, needing level 90 cooking to open a door inside the cooking guild that allows users to access the bank/stove so close.

I tried this in ObjectHandler, but honestly don’t have a clue how to call it.

} else if (id == 26810) { //ID of door in cooking guild if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.COOKING) < 90) { player.getPackets() .sendGameMessage( "You need a cooking level of 90 to enter this part of the guild.", true); return; }

EDIT: Sorry everyone! I got it to work, my player account was just bugged with “196” after I did reset and master, after it went down to below 90 it send that message. (:

This can be locked.

Read full topic
item.source: Request lock, fixed my own issue
